name: Edgewell Personal Care Company
description: Edgewell Personal Care Company is a global consumer products company focused on the development and marketing of personal care products. Founded in 2013 as a spin-off from Energizer Holdings, Edgewell has built a strong portfolio of brands that cater to various personal grooming and hygiene needs. The company’s product offerings include shaving products, feminine care, sun care, and skin care, under well-known brands such as Schick, Wilkinson Sword, Banana Boat, and Playtex. Edgewell is committed to sustainability and innovation, striving to improve the everyday lives of consumers while minimizing its environmental impact. The company invests heavily in research and development to create products that not only meet consumer needs but also incorporate eco-friendly materials and practices. Edgewell operates in a highly competitive landscape, continually adapting to market trends and consumer preferences. With a presence in over 50 countries, Edgewell aims to be a global leader in personal care by delivering quality products and maintaining strong relationships with customers and retailers alike.
